docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 17 --The United States soccer team today scored its second victory in two starts in the international tournament, defeating Paraguay, 3 to 0.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 17 --The United States soccer team today scored its second victory in two starts in the international tournament, defeating Paraguay, 3 to 0.

headline.main: United States Soccer Team Turns Back Paraguay, 3 to 0, in International Play

docs.snippet: LA PAZ, Bolivia, July 17.--Bolivia plans to deliver the Paraguayan Fort Boqueron tomorrow to the Uruguayam army officer appointed to oversee the exchange in accordance with the Washington, protocol of last September.
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PAZ, Bolivia, July 17.--Bolivia plans to deliver the Paraguayan Fort Boqueron tomorrow to the Uruguayam army officer appointed to oversee the exchange in accordance with the Washington, protocol of last September.
docs.abstract: Bolivia plans to turn over Fort Boqueron today

headline.main: BOLIVIA YIELDS FORT TODAY; Will Turn Over Boqueron In Honor of Paraguayan Independence Day.

headline.main: Notes of Social Activities in New York and Elsewhere

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 18.--On the centennial of the first Constitution of Uruguay, President Hoover sent a telegram of felicitation to President Campisteguy at Montevideo today, while Secretary Stimson sent congratulations to Foreign Minister Dominguez....
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 18.--On the centennial of the first Constitution of Uruguay, President Hoover sent a telegram of felicitation to President Campisteguy at Montevideo today, while Secretary Stimson sent congratulations to Foreign Minister Dominguez. The President's message read:

headline.main: HOOVER FELICITATES PRESIDENT OF URUGUAY; Stimson Adds Greeting on Centennial of Constitution--Envoy Gives Luncheon at Capital.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times.Times Wide World Photo

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 19 (AP).--Argentina defeated Mexico, 6--3, and Chile conquered France, 1--0, in today's matches in the world's soccer football championship tournament here.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 19 (AP).--Argentina defeated Mexico, 6--3, and Chile conquered France, 1--0, in today's matches in the world's soccer football championship tournament here.

headline.main: ARGENTINA SOCCER VICTOR.; Chile Also Wins in World's Title Play at Uruguay.

headline.main: TOPICS IN WALL STREET.; News, Comment and Incident, On the Stock Exchange and In the Financial Markets. The Retreat of the Bootleggers. Hot Shots From Lombard Street. A Study in Contrasts. Couzens One Up. A.T. and T. Convertibles. Again the Bus. Last Week's Movements of Gold.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 19 (AP).--The small Greek freighter Calypso Vergotis, bound from Europe to Buenos Aires, grounded today on Banco Ingles reef near here. A tug was dispatched to her assistance, but her plight was not serious.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 19 (AP).--The small Greek freighter Calypso Vergotis, bound from Europe to Buenos Aires, grounded today on Banco Ingles reef near here. A tug was dispatched to her assistance, but her plight was not serious.
docs.abstract: Calypso Vergotis (S S) aground on Banco Ingles reef, Uruguay
